0.2.0.en: Added 2 extra cards: [condition: is timer running, action: cancel running timer]

0.3.0.en: added extra feature on dim card. Restore previous dim level

0.3.1.en: Fixed a bug that prevented timers could get reset

0.4.0.en: Added settings page, to see and cancel running timers

0.4.1.en: Added details view on a timer in the settings page

0.5.0.en: Homey V2 compatibility: changed api call to change device state

0.6.0.en: Cancel timer when light turned off manually, handle name changes of devices

0.6.1.en: Fixed settings page could contain timers that where expired

0.6.2.en: Fixed selecting devices. Fixed missing reference to event listener, making the app crash. Extra cache clear of api, to force update device state. Updated athom api

0.7.0.en: Removed instance caching of API results in app. Fixed a bug when filtering on devices, while zone name isn't available anymore

0.7.1.en: Refactored code to be more consistent. Fix retrieving capability value, instead of set. Fixed an issue, where old capability values got lost. Handle missing reference to previous timer.

0.7.3.en: Fixed a bug where timers wouldn't start anymore, after you manually turned off a device while the timer was still running

0.8.2.en: converted to typescript, possible fix for is_timer_running condition card
